**Reasoning**  
- The "Initial20231231001" entries are for the opening balances and are repeated three times with inconsistent categories and amounts in both "recorded_type" and "recorded_amount". The invoice only supports one set (category+amount) per id, so all but one must be wrong.
- For "Expense20240129001" and "Expense20240118001", the actual (original) date is given in the invoice text and/or risk_issues column, which does not match the "recorded_date". Category/amount/other discrepancies are from the same id with different rows (these are replicated records that only one should match the invoice).
- For all cases, the more reliable data (per instructions) is from the invoice and associated remarks/"risk_issues" field, while the inconsistent data appears in the main table columns.

If more inconsistencies are detected, iterate in the same way.
